content.description: Squat start with a left hand three finger pocket and a right hand crimp. From there, stick a right hand edge, gain a heel hook to the right, match hands on the edge, and climb up through the generous features to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad or two will do. It has a good landing.
content.location:
It climbs the east face of Exoplanet and uses the same finish as

Big Galoot

.

content.description:
Stand start with hands matched on the jug. From there, reach a right hand edge, place a high right heel, then begin traversing left through an edge to reach a mini-shelf, work through some sloper-edges to gain a good hueco-like feature on the face, and continue up the remainder to reach an easy mantel.

A sit start can be added to the problem as well. It adds two moves that are maybe V5ish in difficulty. The movement involved is quite good, but I didn't have the endurance to finish the problem.
content.protection: A pair of pads. This has a great landing, but it covers some ground.
content.location:
It climbs the north face of Exoplanet and uses the same finish as

Ideometer Effect

.
